hep.physics.jet
Interface JetFinder

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJetFinder, FixNumberOfJetsFinder
public interface JetFinder

Interface to be implemented by all jet finders

Version:
12/16/98
Author:
Gary Bower
Source Code:
